faqs.question: What are your store hours?
faqs.answer: We’re open Monday–Saturday from 9:00 AM to 8:00 PM and Sunday from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM.

faqs.question: Where are you located?
faqs.answer: Our bookstore is at 123 Main Street, Anytown. Free parking is available behind the store.

faqs.question: Do you offer online ordering?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can browse and order books on our website at www.examplebookstore.com.

faqs.question: What is your return and exchange policy?
faqs.answer: You may return or exchange new, unused books within 30 days of purchase with a receipt.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: After your order ships, we’ll email you a tracking number and link.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complimentary gift wrapping at checkout or in-store.

faqs.question: Can I purchase a gift card?
faqs.answer: Absolutely—physical and e-gift cards are available in any denomination.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship worldwide. International shipping rates vary by destination.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Domestic orders usually arrive in 3–7 business days; international orders vary by location.

faqs.question: What are your shipping fees?
faqs.answer: Standard shipping is $5 for orders under $50 and free for orders over $50.

faqs.question: Can I cancel or modify my order?
faqs.answer: You may cancel or change your order within 24 hours of placing it by contacting customer service.

faqs.question: Do you offer special orders or pre-orders?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can special-order out-of-stock titles and accept pre-orders for upcoming releases.

faqs.question: Is there a loyalty or rewards program?
faqs.answer: Yes, join our Book Lovers Club to earn 1 point per dollar spent and redeem rewards.

faqs.question: How do I apply a promotional code?
faqs.answer: Enter your promo code at checkout before completing payment to see the discount.

faqs.question: Do you host book signings or events?
faqs.answer: Yes, please check our events calendar on the website for upcoming signings and readings.

faqs.question: Can I reserve a book in advance?
faqs.answer: You can place a hold online or by phone; we’ll keep it for you for 48 hours.

faqs.question: What if a book is out of stock?
faqs.answer: You can request a backorder notification or consider a similar title we have in stock.

faqs.question: Do you offer e-books or audiobooks?
faqs.answer: Yes, e-books and audiobooks are available through our partner app—ask us for details.

faqs.question: From which place do ship books?
faqs.answer: Our shop books storage is located in Ukraine, Lviv on Kulparkivska 170 street

faqs.question: If I live in Lviv can I directly take it?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can call our manager (+38099999999) to arrange a delivery take out.
